text: The 2010–11 season is Manchester United's 19th season in the Premier League. In September, Nemanja Vidić named as Manchester United's new captain. == Pre- season == Manchester United started their season with a tour in North America for the first time since 2004. Date Opponents Result Scorers 16 July 2010 Celtic 3 – 1 Berbatov, Welbeck, Cleverley 21 July 2010 Philadelphia Union 1 – 0 Obertan 25 July 2010 Kansas City Wizards 1 – 2 Berbatov 28 July 2010 MLS All-Stars 5 – 2 Macheda (2), Gibson, Cleverley, Hernández 30 July 2010 Guadalajara 2 – 3 Smalling, Nani 4 August 2010 Airtricity League XI 7 – 1 Park (2), Owen, Hernández, Valencia, Evans, Nani == Transfers == === In === Pos.
